item.description:
Continuing our monthly RPGA day at the Doric Masonic Center with the second core adventure!

CORE1-2 The Radiant Vessel of Thesk

Rumors of a great item, touched by divinity, have traveled across Faer√ªn. Those with an interest in possessing the item and benefiting from its power have sent agents to find it, but no one seems to know what or where it is. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Thesk for characters levels 1-4.

Bring your characters from last time or if you want to create a character feel free to show up early, or use the guidelines on the RPGA site to create one before hand! Just be ready to play at 11! There is a Patriots game at 4pm that day so we are going to start an hour early this time at 11am and we will be done by 3pm. I have RPGA membership cards for anyone who needs one, there will be punch and chips to snack on as well.

Last time we had two guests not show up so no guests are allowed this time, if you want to reserve a spot then create an account please. This way we can track who is RSVPing but not showing up. Thanks!
item.name: Living Forgotten Realms Game Day 02
